leadingComments.value: This software comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY. For details, see
the enclosed file COPYING for license information (GPL). If you
did not receive this file, see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt.

trailingComments.value: Register the mutation sharer plugin so persistent states across different tabs would be synced. This plugin
is limited to only a single instance, so we do it only once, in the root store, with correct references.
IE has completely broken localStorage implementation: it's not updated properly, and passed parameters have
wrong values. In this case, simply omit mutation sharer plugin.
See https://www.caniuse.com/#search=localstorage under Known issues for more information.
